attributes.action: Stop The Change To The Planning System - Protect Green Belts
attributes.additional_details:
The Government has created a draft National Policy Planning Framework (NPPF) that basically ends the existence of Green belt areas and allows development on land that would be protected. These Governments are only custodians of our land and have no right to take our countryside, nature reserves, wildlife areas away.

Stop them now, support the unheard protests of organisations like the National Trust and support my epetition today.
Tell the Government the people want to preserve our rurral. greenbelt and countryside and that is our wish.
